claude-3-sonnet-bedrock.feature: Claude 3 Sonnet by Anthropic via AWS Bedrock - balanced performance and speed for complex tasks with strong reasoning capabilities. Ideal for content generation, analysis, and conversational AI applications.

claude-3-haiku-bedrock.feature: Claude 3 Haiku by Anthropic via AWS Bedrock - fastest and most cost-effective model in the Claude 3 family. Optimized for quick responses and high-volume tasks with excellent efficiency.

titan-text-express-bedrock.feature: Amazon Titan Text Express via AWS Bedrock - fast and cost-effective text generation model optimized for a wide range of tasks including summarization, Q&A, and content creation.

llama-3-70b-bedrock.feature: Llama 3 70B Instruct by Meta via AWS Bedrock - powerful open-source model with 70 billion parameters. Excellent for complex reasoning, code generation, and multilingual tasks.

mistral-7b-bedrock.feature: Mistral 7B Instruct by Mistral AI via AWS Bedrock - efficient 7 billion parameter model optimized for instruction-following. Provides strong performance with fast inference and cost-effectiveness.
